meanings.definition: A large motor vehicle for carrying passengers by road, typically along a fixed route.
meanings.sent1: The autobuses arrived at the station right on time.
meanings.sent2: I take the autobuses to work every morning.
meanings.sent3: The autobuses decided to have a race to see who could reach the stop first.
meanings.sent4: The autobuses lined up on the road like a row of giant metal caterpillars.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the autobuses roaring down the street filled the air.
